reviewText:
First at all, I have to say AMAZON.com is: Awsome! They promise delivery for a specific day and right on time they came. Love it!
It was a very fast no only to deliver, but to order and from home. Great!
My newphew loves this series so much that he is going to be so Happy to have this collection. Is nothing better than see his reaction to about sometime he will be entertain and he loves so much at the same time. Priceless!

My 15 month old son is obsessed with Pocoyo. We started watching it on YouTube, but the selection is really poor. I have now purchased every DVD available and it keeps my kid entertained during our long 6 hour drives to visit grandma and grandpa. Pocoyo is growing on me too :-) and I'm 28!
Ever since these arrived, it is all my son has wanted to watch. He will watch the same shows over and over again. Well worth the buy, even if they are a bit pricey.

I love the show.  Our toddler loves the show.  Only drawback is the inclusion of what appear to be endless and continuous commercials in the middle of the CD (almost a dozen or so) before further Pocoyo episodes are shown.  You can skip them manually, but it is a major annoyance.

The kids love Pocoyo and I find it very entertaining. It is simple animation and keeps it short perfect for toddlers attention span. The only thing I don't like of the DVD is that for each 7 minute long episode it plays the Pocoyo introduction. Wish they would of set it up so it goes straight into the episode. I do love that it comes in Spanish since we are raising our children bi-lingual.
My little princess loves Pocoyo and she still enjoying all the DVD', very good product. She watch the e DVD' all day long.

Three Pocoyo DVDs for the meager price of $20?  Yes, please!  My daughter absolutely loves watching Pocoyo whether it's on Netflix, the Pocoyo iPhone/iPad app or on DVD.  Getting three DVDs for this price is fantastic.  All the episodes are great and there are so many that it's easy to rotate the DVDs as to not get bored with them.  Best Pocoyo deal on Amazon!

Pocoyo is a wonderful show. Our 18 month old twins love it! However, please note that the DVDs are mislabeled. All 3 claim to be in widescreen format, but only 1 of them (Super Pocoyo) actually is. The kids don't notice, but I do. So just be aware that you may not get what the box claims.

I bought this for my son because my mom says he loves Pocoyo when he watches it at her house.  And now that we have this set, I confess that I am (at 42 years of age) hooked on Pocoyo too!  The animation is funny and the stories are educational without being preachy or overly-sweet.  Both my son and roll around laughing at some parts.  If you haven't tried Pocoyo on your little one yet, I recommend it!

My 2 year old boy loves pocoyo. I was going to him just one dvd but then I saw this one with 3 dvd's. You get 4.5 hours of pocoyo for a great price. My son is bilingual so he loves pocoyo in spanish or english and this set you get both you can either watch it in english or spanish. Great dvd's and great price plus arrived in 2 days my son was so happy when I showed him the set. Will definitely be buying more.

Awesome dvds! Great condition! Fast shipping!
POCOYO ROCKS!
My nephew loved his present, which happened to be this movie pack. I love that as soon as I put this on for him he sits down and doesn't get up at all!!
Big hit with my 2 & 4 yr old, they are also big fans of the show (2yr olds favorite).
Keeping my 3 year old daughter entertained.
My kids all love Pocoyo - ordered in advance for my daughters birthday!

I absolutely adore this show. I am a pediatric nurse and bought these DVD's for a regular patient of mine. It's the perfect combination of color and education for toddlers. I don't even mind watching it myself.
one of my sons favorite movies!
Pocoyo is just so stinking cute.  3 videos= a loooooooong time watching Pocoyo.
Great product, fast delivery.

I purchased this Pocoyo 3-pack of DVD's for my two youngest grandchildren, and they absolutely love it.  I have to confess that I love it, too!  The colors are brilliant, the characters and plots are simple and fun, and the whole experience of watching leaves you feeling happy!
My son loves this show!!!
My son loved it
Very funy and educational
Great show for young babies and toddlers.  My daughter has enjoyed this set.
Another fantastic addition to my daughter's growing collection of Pocoyo DVDs. She watches the Let's Party the most of the three but she adores all of them!
Great Dvds
Our 3 year old son loves Pocoyo and certainly watches the DVD's a lot. It keeps him distracted for us to get things done.
Keeps my son very entertained! The first time he saw Pocoyo he was 7 months old and since then he still gets super excited to watch it.
my son loved these movies. watch time and again. especially now that pocoyo isn't on during the day.would buy again
Cute DVDs I love watching them with my little guy. He enjoys the bright colors and I like that it comes in Spanish too.
I got this because my kids love pocoyo. It arrived on time. and you cant beat the quality for the price.

A great show.  My 4 1/2 year old grandchild loves it.  I love it and I'm not into cartoon-type shows.  So cute, entertaining, and calming, all at the same time.  The sound effects on the dvds is awesome too.  Doesn't overstimulate like a lot of the kids shows do these days.
he loves pocoyo and we got this we put it on when we travel in a dvd player he is so happy and starts cracking up with things that pocoyo and his friends do
this is a must have in your collection..it offers great and safe alternative for young kids. My baby loves it.
Hours of fun for the whole family.  My husband and I bought this DVD pack and other Pocoyo DVDs for our grand daughter; she loves them!
This item came as described and I received them on time. I recommend them to anyone who wishes to help their child/children learn through play and laughter
My kid loves pocoyo so purchasing these videos was a no brainer plus I love that he learns lessons from each episode along with thunderous laughter
My little one is 20 months and she loves pocoyo.  These videos held her attention for a 5 hour drive on vacation.  No crying, no fussing.  Gotta love that!

This 3 pack is great for those who love Pocoyo. We've just watched Pocoyo on Netflix so far, so we were happy to find this DVD pack. Our daughter loves Pocoyo and these DVDs have helped us expand our library to kept her happy! Arrived on time and in good condition. :)
My daughter loves Pocoyo. Great DVD and episodes. Easily to entertain kids for hours. Highly recommend. Best Pocoyo deal on Amazon!
This was an okay purchase.  My son liked the show on Nick Jr and this is basically that same series.
My son loves Pocoyo and this was a great find. He loves all the episodes in this series. They arrived quickly and came in great condition.

My son really likes Pocoyo and I was able to get this 3-pack DVD set which has almost all of the Pocoyo episodes on it.
He really enjoys watching them and, if your child is a Pocoyo fan, then they will like them too.

My daughter likes Pocoyo very much. Each episode is not longer than 10 minutes which is great for a toddler. We are a bilingual family and that it has audio in both languages is very important.
The only thing I do not like very much is that they use "wonderful/maravilloso" words more often than necessary.  Since I try to teach correct language and not over react -negatively nor positively, I found it a little annoying.

I have watched this dvd about 100 times since i bought it. My son loves pocoyo and i have no idea why. They do have some really good episodes. Its not a waste of money. I suggesting getting the 5 dollar one first to see if your kids will like it then the 3 pack
I bought it thinking it was a game, but anyway my nieces liked to watch the vdeos.  I was looking for games for a tablet for kids.
I saw this at my school. Fell in love with Pocoyo and had to get it for the kiddos. Their prents love it too.
My kids can't get enough of Pocoyo and his friends, and this bundle provides hours of entertainment and lessons. The show design helps keep the focus on the characters.
little pricing for cds but what can you do, then need to make them in vcr again so if you drop it does ruin it
Pocoyo is all about friendship and fun.  No uncomfortable subjects.  The graphics are simple yet my kids have great big smiles when they watch the videos.

My son loves Pocoyo but it's not the most popular cartoon on Nick so he doesn't get to see it very often.  I was looking for a DVD to give him for Valentine's Day and saw this set.  I was very happy with the price.  It's 9 episodes that I think he'll love and the shipping was super fast.
This was great to bring along our plane trip wih a video player!  He loves Pocoyo and gave him a plesent time on the flight

If your kids love pokoyo, this is a must have,  numerous episodes on each disk for a lengthly play time.  Keeps my kiddos entertained, especially in the car on road trips.  Must have for any pokoyo fan!
My daughter loves these shows. It's short so it keeps her attention and simple so she can understand the content.
Great for children who loves Pocoyo and Friends.  My daughter loves Pocoyo, so having this special 3 pack was a great steal!

If your child/grandchild loves Pocoyo as mine do, this is a great set of videos to have. It's not just one show per video, like some other sets. Each DVD has 3 or 4 separate "shows" on it. The set provides many hours of Pocoyo viewing pleasure for your little ones. Terrific deal!
Picked this up as a Christmas gift for our daughter who loves Pocoyo. Awesome DVDs and an awesome price. Many many hours of Pocoyo on these DVDs. Great for long trips.
Ordered for my nephew who is absolutely enthralled with this cartoon.  But this on the laptop for him to watch... didn't hear anything from him but laughter.  It's a winner

This set added three more to our collection of Pocoyo.  My grandson is three and these little characters have him rolling on the floor.  The little situations these characters get themselves into are simple and easy to undestand and are a great purchase for a gift for toddlers.
Pocoyo and friends are the gentlest most charming characters.  Babies as well as young elementary age kiddos really enjoy Pocoyo.
Good product, good seller.
GOOD
Usefull
This is the only show my 2 yr old is allowed to watch. Very sweet. Would recommend to any toddler
Love pocoyo. Helps me understand the internal logic of my toddlers. And the dvd is bilingual.
My daughter loved her pocoyo dvd's that went along with her pocoyo themed birthday party!
Love this carton, very enjoyable even for adults, these are great.
My 4 year old daughter LOVES Pocoyo and was very excited when we got this. Great price.
too bad the video quality is very bad, it hurts my eyes when watching it,its out of focus and very pixelated at times!  i can't let my son watch this!! too bad because he loves his POCOYO!
I bought this when my grandson was 2.  Now he is six and his sister is 3.  They both enjoy watching it!
